name: life changing pill
description: The Life Changing Pill is a CTO-led project on the Solana blockchain, dedicated to building utility-focused tools that help users navigate crypto safely and trade with confidence. Products are developed at PillNet Labs, the innovation hub where new solutions take shape. At the core, PillNet, our in-house AI, fuels the entire ecosystem. Driving transparency, security, and efficiency across every tool. All of this is powered by the Life Changing $PILL token, the key that unlocks it all.
